data.text: @cashubham27 Thanks for sharing, Shubham. We're glad to hear that you had a great experience flying with us. We look forward to welcoming you onboard again, soon. Stay #RedHotSpicy😊

data.text:
Dil walon ki nagri Dilli ko Hyderabad ka salaam! A new flight from #Hyderabad to #Delhi. Get ready to soak in the beauty, #culture and #delicious food of Delhi. 
Also, connecting #Bagdogra, #Leh and more cities with one-stop #connections. Book now at https://t.co/PykmFjH9gx https://t.co/vOE8dCIRPL
@sanjeebjha7 We wish you a pleasant flight, Mr. Jha. Stay #RedHotSpicy 😀
@Deepika88825184 Please be assured, our team shall get back with an update soon.
@infinity9191 Hi, we love to hear this. We look forward to welcoming you on-board again soon. Stay #RedHotSpicy 😀
@Deepika88825184 Deepika, we've updated our team to check and get back to you on priority.
@Parody_at_par You may connect with our crew onboard for assistance in this regard.

https://t.co/Qi2laHRc1E

data.text: @narendralv Hi Narendra, drones are only allowed as check-in baggage. The batteries must be removed and can be carried as hand baggage only, the battery terminals should be insulated to avoid any unintentional short circuit. The maximum watt hour of the battery must not exceed 160 WH.
